text: Mixing the Ingredients Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF.  Melt the butter in a small saucepan.  Add the sugar when the butter has melted. Stir to mix through and dissolve. Remove from the heat.  Add the flour. Then add the baking powder, walnuts, brown sugar, and cocoa powder. Mix well. Baking the Fruit Fingers Line a baking sheet with parchment or baking paper. This will prevent the fruit fingers from sticking to the pan. Press the mixture across the pan. Level it across the pan so the mixture is even. Place in the preheated oven. Bake for 20-30 minutes or until the slice starts to come away from the sides of the pan. Finishing the Fruit Fingers Remove from the heat.  Allow to cool in the tray placed on a wire cooling rack. When semi-cooled, mark into finger shapes and cut through. Remove from the tray and let cool fully on the wire cooling rack.  Ice with chocolate icing when cooled completely.  Finished.
